name: Capital
description: A capital city houses the seat of government and attracts the most powerful and influential people, creating opportunities for political intrigue and advancement. The strict security and surveillance make it dangerous for criminals, while the concentration of power creates intense rivalries.
atmosphere: City of power and politics where fate of nations is decided in grand halls and shadowy backrooms. Air carries wealth, authority, and political maneuvering tension scent. Streets patrolled by well-armed guards. Grand buildings of government and nobility create majesty and authority atmosphere. Concentration of power creates electric atmosphere where every conversation might be overheard. Strict security provides safety for powerful while creating danger for those outside the law.
